75631.「シャデルが どういう言葉を遺したのか……。\n さっそく 聞いてみましょう。: Now we can hear Shadel's final words...

75632.<pipipi_low>「ま…魔物に襲われ…深手を負ってしまった。\n もう一歩:
<pipipi_low>A...a monster attacked me...
The wound is quite serious...
I...I can't move at all...

75633.<pipipi_low>「わ…私は おそらく\n ここで 死ぬことに…なるだろう:
<pipipi_low>I...I am probably going to...die
here... So...I will leave this final message.

75634.<pipipi_low>「メルエ……。お前の…足が 治っ…たら\n ふたりで ヴ:
<pipipi_low>
"Merue...once your legs...are healed... We
can go to the...Milena Coast together..."
I'd always tell you that...

75635.<pipipi_low>「あれ…は ウソなんだ……。\n そんな日が来な…いこと:
<pipipi_low>
That...that was a lie... I knew... I knew
that day would never come...
I've done nothing but...lie to you...

75636.<pipipi_low>「お前に…は 正直に生きろと言い…続けたのに\n ウソを:
<pipipi_low>
I always told you...to live an honest life...
I regret...lying to you... I'm sorry...that I
couldn't tell you the...truth...

75637.<pipipi_low>「ただ 足なんか…治らなくても お前に…は\n ひとりの:
<pipipi_low>
But even...if your legs don't heal... You are
a wonderful person... That's why...you have
to believe in yourself...and live on...

75638.<pipipi_low>「こ…この声が いつか\n お前のもと…へ届くことを 祈:
<pipipi_low>
I...I hope that this voice...will reach
you...some...day...

75640.「シャデル……。\n 最後の最後まで メルエのことを\n 気にしていたのか……。:
Shadel...
Even in your dying breath, you still had Merue
in your thoughts...

75641.「彼の最期の言葉が聞けて よかったです。\n 親友の遺品ですので どうか\n こ:
I am relieved to hear his final words. As this
is the memento of my dear friend, please
allow me to hold onto it.

75642.「そういえば 最初に ペンダントを拾われた方は\n 私の声が聞こえて おどろかれ:
Come to think of it...the first person who found this pendant was shocked to hear my voice. If you would, could you give them my
apologies?

75644.「これには きっと\n メルエの声が 入っているのでしょう。\n さっそく 聞い:
This must have Merue's voice recorded inside
of it...

75646.「シャデル叔父さんが もしも 生きていて\n このペンダントを 手に取った時のた:
I will record this message in the event that
my Uncle Shadel is alive and finds this
pendant well.

75647.「私に…… 奇跡が もたらされました。\n そして その奇跡のチカラで\n 私は:
A...a miracle appeared right at my doorstep.
And with that miracle, I was able to walk
again.

75648.「歩けるようになったら 幸せになれる……。\n 小さい頃から そう信じきっていま:
Since I was little, I believed that if I could
walk, then I would be happy... but now, to
be honest, I'm really afraid...

75649.「シャデル叔父さん……。私は ワケあって\n 遠い遠い旅に 出なければなりません:
Uncle Shadel... I have to go on a journey to a
place far, far away for reasons unknown to
me. I probably won't be able to come back.

75650.「だから 旅に出る前に\n 私の心の内を 話しておきます。:
So, before I leave, I want to tell you what
I've been thinking about.

75651.「シャデル叔父さん。私は 知っていました。\n 私の足が治らないのは わかってい:
Uncle Shadel, I knew... I knew that my leg
would never heal. Yet you continued to lie
to me...

75652.「そんな叔父さんのウソに 私は 何度も\n はげまされました。叔父さんが いなか:
But those lies continued to inspire me. If
not for you, I might have given up on
everything.

75653.「シャデル叔父さん。今まで ありがとう……。\n もう一度 ふたりで あの灯台が:
Thank you for everything... I wish we could
have gone to Milena Coast one last time to
look at the lighthouse...

75655.「遠い旅に出ます……か。\n お互いを思いやりながら どちらの想いも\n 相手に:
A journey to a place far, far away...? How
sad that their strong feelings for one another
were just out of reach...

75656.「すいません……。わがままついでに\n ひとつ 私からの お願いを聞いてください:
I'm sorry... While I still have you here,
please listen to my one last request.

75657.「私は このふたつのペンダントを\n ふたりが ずっと行きたいと願っていた\n:
I'm going to take these pendants to Mirena
Coast, that place the both of them wanted
to go.

75658.「特に意味は ありません。ありませんが\n 持ち主の気持ちが 込められている\n:
I know it doesn't have much meaning, but
I want to show these pendants to that coast
one last time.

75659.「どうか ウェナ諸島 ヴェリナード領西にある\n 南西の桟橋まで 先導を お願い:
If you would, could you lead the way to the
southwest pier in Verinard West? I will
follow behind you.

75660.「あなたが 先導してくれたおかげで\n 非力な私でも ここまで来ることができまし:
Thanks to you, even someone as powerless as
me could make it this far. I truly appreciate
it.

75661.「大切な物には 持ち主の想いが宿るといいます。\n ふたつのペンダントに この海:
They say that treasured objects hold the thoughts and feelings of their owners. I'm happy that I can show these pendants a
view of this coast...

75663.「ペンダントが 輝きだした……？\n こんな機能は ついてないはずですが……。:
The pendant's shining...?
It shouldn't be able to...

75665.「こんな不思議なことが 起きるなんて……。\n まるで この海岸に来られたことを:
What a strange thing... It's almost like
they're showing their happiness for being
reunited here...

75666.「あのペンダントの願いを かなえることが\n もしかしたら 天から与えられた\n:
Fulfilling the wishes of those two pendants...
Perhaps it was a divine mission bestowed
upon me...

75667.「あなたには すっかり\n お世話に なってしまいましたね。\n どうぞ こちら:
You really have been a great help to me.
Please take this.

75668.「ペンダントを 拾われた方にも\n よろしくお伝えください。それでは……。:
Please give my regards to the person who
found the pendant.

78240.「……おや？ どうやら 持ち物が\n いっぱいのご様子。あずかっておきますので\:
...What's this? It seems you're already
carrying too much to accept this. I'll hold
onto it here until you're ready to collect it.

78241.「最後まで お付き合いいただき\n 本当に ありがとうございました。\n 私は:
Thank you very much for your time. I will
leave you now.
